title: Главные тайны мира
overview: We live in an era when everything seems easy to find a scientific explanation for. The planet has been studied far and wide. However, the world jealously guards its secrets, and scientists can only build hypotheses, trying to unravel them. The Lake of Skeletons in India, the ice worms of Antarctica, the rotating island in Argentina, the mysteries of chronomirages, the ghost train that disappeared in the fog, the secrets of the Blue Hole in the Red Sea, ... All this and other mysteries are in the REN TV channel project "The Main Secrets of the World".
